formulation:
Which keyword is used to create a class in Java?
 a) MyClass
 b) class 
 c) className
 d) class()

Which method can be used to return a string in upper case letters?
 a) touppercase()
 b) upperCase()
 c) tuc()
 d) toUpperCase()
The value of a string variable can be surrounded by single quotes. (Yes or No)

Which method can be used to find the length of a string?
 a) getLength()
 b) length()
 c) getSize()
 d) len()

Which data type is used to create a variable that should store text?
 a) string
 b) String
 c) myString
 d) Txt

How do you insert COMMENTS in Java code?
 a) // This is a comment
 b) # This is a comment
 c) /* This is a comment
Java is short for "JavaScript" (Yes or No)?
